subtitle: Our Features
heading: Enhance Your Bible Study Experience
description: Explore the powerful features of Scriptura designed to help you dive deeper into the Scriptures.
feature_1_description: Engage with interactive Bible lessons that bring Scripture to life.
feature_2_description: Receive study plans tailored to your unique learning style.
feature_3_description: Join a vibrant community of believers to share insights and inspiration.
feature_4_description: Leverage AI to gain deeper understanding and context of the Bible.
